description: Clara.io is a 3D graphics program published by Exocortex Technologies. You can access Clara.io using a web browser; free and paid versions are available.

Primarily, you can use Clara.io to create and export 3D scenes and models. The program can save 3D models in a variety of formats, including .FBX , .STL , and .OBJ . However, Clara.io's default, proprietary 3D model format is the Clara Archive format.
